text: Nicholas Peter Volpe (February 23, 1926 â€“ August 21, 2021) was a Canadian football player. He played for the Toronto Argonauts from 1949 until 1952. He won the Grey Cup with the Argonauts in 1950. Volpe was born in Toronto, Ontario. Volpe died in Toronto on August 21, 2021 at the age of 95.Argos Mourn the Passing of Nick Volpe ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Toronto Argonauts players
title: Nick Volpe
